channel.title: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
channel.description:
Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
[poll type=regular public=true] * Import Into Auxy * Import via DAW * Both * Neither [/poll]

item.title: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
item.dc:creator: AntarcticStars
item.description:
iammane:

I think I get it, you’re asking if we sample directly into Auxy and work there OR bounce Auxy stems to a DAW and add the samples and etc there??

must’ve been that hard to figure out lol

Read full topic

item.title: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I don’t believe this was the case. I think it means do you transfer .wav files into auxy directly without alteration or do you put them into another app first? -shrug-

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?

item.title: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Man this is a confusing question lol.

Auxy does not import, you “Copy To” Auxy from somewhere else (GarageBand, blocs wave etc).

I think question was do you use samples in Auxy or do you dump everything into a DAW?

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?

item.title: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Wait you can import them directly via auxy? xD I was only doing it in garageband (iOS) because I thought that was required! I’ll probably be using both from now on since I may need to tweak volume if I’m sampling from my notation software.

Read full topic

i use daw because i don’t have a mac readily available and it’s easier to custom pitch/timestretch to my liking.

I think I get it, you’re asking if we sample directly into Auxy and work there OR bounce Auxy stems to a DAW and add the samples and etc there??

Then yes for now, try to keep as much as possible in Auxy / iOS since I don’t have the time to sit down in a home studio proper

item.title: [POLL] Do you prefer importing samples via Auxy or using external apps/DAWs?
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Wait… what do you mean by “import via DAW?”

I make little loops in Auxy, then bounce them to Ableton Live and I import other samples too, and make the track in Live.
